body: So im confused on what EULA is and people keep saying EULA is taking over or something and im so confused about EULA ? Can anyone explain :3
body_tagged: So im confused on what EULA is and people keep saying EULA is taking over or something and im so confused about EULA ? Can anyone explain :3
title: Confused About EULA

replies.body: Mojang wants gameplay to be fair for all users. So, now MineCraft servers are not allowed to make money off of ranks that have unlock able kits and stuff. You can still donate, but not for perks like unlock able kits and enchanted diamond swords and such.
replies.body_tagged: Mojang wants gameplay to be fair for all users. So, now MineCraft servers are not allowed to make money off of ranks that have unlock able kits and stuff. You can still donate, but not for perks like unlock able kits and enchanted diamond swords and such.

replies.body: pls stop spamming the forums with this!
replies.body_tagged: pls stop spamming the forums with this!

replies.body: EULA is an agreement you come by, everyday when you hit the play button on the start screen of Minecraft. But in the recent months mojang has been recieveing a MASS amounts of emails from parents, about being charged approximatly $10,000 USD for a "Vanilla item-Kit" on servers. Therefor they are reinforcing the rule of EULA to confiscate this problem, I am not entirely sure about this, and how much damage it can cost to servers. Now, some servers like the Archon might have to rely on charging people yearly to get whitelisted on the server. :)
replies.body_tagged: EULA is an agreement you come by, everyday when you hit the play button on the start screen of Minecraft. But in the recent months mojang has been recieveing a MASS amounts of emails from parents, about being charged approximatly $10,000 USD for a "Vanilla item-Kit" on servers. Therefor they are reinforcing the rule of EULA to confiscate this problem, I am not entirely sure about this, and how much damage it can cost to servers. Now, some servers like the Archon might have to rely on charging people yearly to get whitelisted on the server. :)

replies.body: lol mineplex is funny, now donors must purchase with soft currency the regular kits, and there are still donation kits for only donators :P hehehe nothing has changed much, and they also have a better anticheat on their survival games :P trust me, they have their old 1 too, just their new one on sg is annoying, tried fly hacking and it would lag me back like all the other servers... time to get a better hacking program for when I feel like hacking xD
